answers.answer: No I wouldn't worry.  Different women gain different amounts of weight.  I know they say you should gain between 25-35lbs, but less if u were overweight before pregnancy or more if you were underweight.  I really wouldn't worry 2 much about it.  My friends mom gained 100lbs with her and she was a healthy baby!!  Her mom is fine 2

question: so i had my 33 week appointment today and at the beginning of pregnancy i would only gain 2 pounds or i would lose a pound...just within the last month I've been gaining a bit more....as of today, my total weight gain is 17lbs....my doctor seemed upset with me...is it really too much?  before i got pregnant i was 227....I've always been overweight tho.....i do not have gestational diabetes nor anemia or high blood pressure......wat do u guys think? should i worry?
title: weight gain...??
